description:
Being pursued, Yukari and Princess Ichikishima escape the submarine and make it to land where they find themselves confronted by the imperial guard, but manage to fend them off and continue their escape. Learning of their whereabouts, Kanami and the others follow after to try and rescue them. Before they leave on their mission, Maki pulls Kanami aside to issue a warning about Hiyori`s strange behavior.
Source: crunchyroll
